attributes.review: I was so ✨𝐸𝓍𝒾𝓉𝑒𝒹✨ to download this 💖wonderful💖 app. But it took three days to download. When it 🥰finally🥰 downloaded, a talking sandwich showed up on my screen. And it kept saying to ✨ 𝒱𝑜𝓉𝑒 𝒻𝑜𝓇 𝓉𝓇𝓊𝓂𝓅✨ after an hour of this 💕lovely💕talking sandwich It finally went away. But then I started noticing that weird things were happening like my 🍊microwave🍊 started talking🥰 this went on for an hour of my 💝microwave 💝 insulting my every move. ✨for example✨ I was trying to watch 🤩 𝒟𝒾𝓈𝓃𝑒𝓎 𝒸𝒽𝒶𝓃𝓃𝑒𝓁 🤩 but my microwave kept calling me a 🧚‍♀️𝐹𝒶𝓉 𝐿𝑜𝑜𝓈𝑒𝓇 and a 🍊𝒪𝓇𝒶𝓃𝑔𝑒 🍊After my 💕beautiful💕 microwave shut up. I noticed that 🧚‍♀️𝒯𝓇𝓊𝓂𝓅 𝟤𝟢𝟤𝟢🧚‍♀️ was written all over my walls. Anyways, Barron call me 🤩😘
attributes.title: It’s a no for me 🥰

attributes.review: Literally It took me 379 hours for me to download this app and literally it had to restart constantly over and over again every single time so  now I have a big fat roach within my battery and it  destroyed my battery and then after that happened I kept getting cyber calls saying “Hello I will place more bugs within your battery” so the worst experience ever 1 star.
attributes.title: I could cry
